attributes.action: Create new prison spaces and dramatically increase sentencing for those convicted of violent crime, in order to simply remove them from our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is currently a daily occurrence in the UK, that we hear of yet another murder, shooting or an innocent person being beaten to death on their own doorstep. The peace-loving majority of people in the UK need people who are convicted of violent crime simply removing from our streets to enable us to live safely and to maintain our quality of life.
